sentences.en: A biographer tends to flatter the person he intends to write about in his biography.
sentences.cn: 传记作者常常在传记中美化他的传主.

sentences.en: As Frost's official biographer, I mentally filed this information.
sentences.cn: 身为弗洛斯特指定的传记撰写人, 我将这事记在心上.

sentences.en: Boswell was the biographer of Dr Johnson.
sentences.cn: 鲍斯威尔是约翰逊博士的传记作者.

sentences.en: It was a toss - up who was dirtier, Samuel Johnson or his biographer James Boswell.
sentences.cn: 比比哪位更脏, 塞缪尔?约翰逊与其传记作者詹姆斯?博斯维尔难分伯仲.

sentences.en: The biographer will be seized of all pertinent papers and correspondence.
sentences.cn: 这位传记作者将掌握全部有关文件和信件.

sentences.en: We can begin to answer the question with a sentence by Irving's biographer.
sentences.cn: 要解答这个问题,首先引用欧文传记作者的一句话.

trans.tran_en: someone who writes a biography of someone else
